result.eng: I will make you fall in love with me after we're married!
result.ga: tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadh
result.orig: tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadh
result.html: tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadhI will make you fall in love with me after we're married!
result.ponchtml: taḃarfaiḋ mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósaḋI will make you fall in love with me after we're married!

result.eng: Although we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.
result.ga: cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeas
result.orig: cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeas
result.html: cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeasAlthough we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.
result.ponchtml: cé nár ṫiteamar amaċ le ċéile ar fad ṫáinig fuaċt ar an gcairdeasAlthough we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.

result.eng: She came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.
result.ga: tháinig sí go meiriceá roimh thitim an aontais shóivéadaigh
result.orig: tháinig sí go meiriceá roimh thitim an aontais shóivéadaigh
result.html: tháinig sí go meiriceá roimh thitim an aontais shóivéadaighShe came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.
result.ponchtml: ṫáinig sí go meiriceá roiṁ ṫitim an aontais ẛóivéadaiġShe came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.

result.eng: It doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ga: is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.orig: is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.html: is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ponchtml: is cuma dá mbíoḋ siad ag magaḋ ort go dtiteaḋ an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.

result.eng: Don't ever fall in love with a woman.
result.ga: ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoi
result.orig: ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoi
result.html: ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoiDon't ever fall in love with a woman.
result.ponchtml: ná ṫaḃair grá do ċroí ċoíċe do ṁnaoiDon't ever fall in love with a woman.
